hu.akarnokd.rxjava2.subjects

Class SingleSubject<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.reactivex.Single<T>
      • hu.akarnokd.rxjava2.subjects.SingleSubject<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the value type received and emitted
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.reactivex.SingleObserver<T>, io.reactivex.SingleSource<T>
    Deprecated. 
    moved to io.reactivex.subject.SingleSubject in RxJava 2.0.5; will be removed when RxJava 2.1 comes out

    @Deprecated
public final class SingleSubject<T>
extends io.reactivex.Single<T>
implements io.reactivex.SingleObserver<T>
    Represents a hot Single-like source and consumer of events similar to Subjects.

    All methods are thread safe. Calling onSuccess multiple times has no effect. Calling onError multiple times relays the Throwable to the RxJavaPlugins' error handler.

    The SingleSubject doesn't store the Disposables coming through onSubscribe but disposes them once the other onXXX methods were called (terminal state reached).
